column6: House of M tie-in! When orders come down that a leader of the human resistance in Japan must be assassinated, S.H.I.E.L.D.'s highly trained Hellions squad is called in to do it. But when a team of future mutant leaders called the New Mutants find out about this, they must intervene to put an end to a guaranteed disaster of global portions!
column8: | writer:Nunzio DeFilippis | writer:Christina Weir | penciller (cover):Aaron Lopresti
